title: Solving library errors (such as "yourlib.h not found")

fields.name: 1. Is your Library installed?
fields.value: go to the Library Manager (Sketch -> Include Library -> Manage Libraries), search for the library, and install it. if it is already installed, try re-installing it through the library manager (Sketch -> include Library -> Manage Libraries).

fields.name: 2. is your #include statement spelt correctly?
fields.value: check for any capitalization errors as well!

fields.name: Still can't fix it?
fields.value: check out [this arduino-forum post](https://forum.arduino.cc/t/no-headers-files-h-found/596090#:~:text=This%20might%20be%20result%20from,one%20of%20the%20libraries%20folders.) for more assistance.
